File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's
  configuration.
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to
  the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including
  binary files.

    <section class="pt-24 pb-12 bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 to-teal-50">
        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <h1 class="text-5xl md:text-6xl font-playfair font-bold text-emerald-900 mb-6">
                Ideation
            </h1>
            <p class="text-xl md:text-2xl text-emerald-700 mb-8 max-w-2xl mx-auto">
                How our team brainstormed and refined ideas to create a unique solution for our project.
            </p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Main Content -->
    <section id="journey" class="py-20">
        <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6">

            <!-- Requirements Gathering -->
            <div class="mb-16">
                <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-8">
                    Requirement Gathering
                </h3>
                <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8 mt-8">
                    <div class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 space-y-4">
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            User research:
                        </h5>
                        <p>
                            To initiate our project, we engaged in structured requirement gathering to ensure alignment
                            with real user needs and stakeholder expectations. This phase involved collaboration with:
                        </p>
                        <ul class="list-disc list-inside">
                            <li>Glasgow City Council (policy alignment, biodiversity goals)</li>
                            <li>Conservation organisations (e.g. Friends of Glasgow Green, RSPB Scotland)</li>
                            <li>Academic experts (urban ecology, HCI, AI ethics)</li>
                        </ul>

                        <p>
                            To help us analyze environments, activities, and user interactions during field observation
                            and community walks, we utilised the AEIOU framework.
                        </p>

                        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mt-4">
                            <div class="bg-emerald-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <h6 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700 mb-2">Activities:</h6>
                                <p class="text-sm">Observing how citizens and experts interact with the
                                    species identification process, including reporting sightings and verifying data.
                                </p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <h6 class="font-semibold text-blue-700 mb-2">Environments:</h6>
                                <p class="text-sm">Locations such as the Glasgow Botanic Gardens, community
                                    spaces, and digital platforms used for reporting and identification.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-purple-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <h6 class="font-semibold text-purple-700 mb-2">Interactions:</h6>
                                <p class="text-sm">Communication between citizens, experts, and the
                                    reporting system, including email exchanges and feedback loops.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-orange-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <h6 class="font-semibold text-orange-700 mb-2">Objects:</h6>
                                <p class="text-sm">Tools and resources used, such as cameras, smartphones,
                                    spreadsheets, and the iNaturalist platform.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-teal-50 p-4 rounded-lg md:col-span-2">
                                <h6 class="font-semibold text-teal-700 mb-2">Users:</h6>
                                <p class="text-sm">Citizens reporting sightings, experts verifying species, and
                                    council staff managing biodiversity data.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The following insights were gathered and recorded in a document: </p>
                        <div class="mt-6">
                            <img src="assets/ideation-aeiou.png" 
                                 alt="AEIOU Framework Analysis - Activities, Environments, Interactions, Objects, and Users documentation" 
                                 class="w-full rounded-lg shadow-lg border border-gray-200">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8 mt-8">
                    <div class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 space-y-4">
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            Partner Meeting:
                        </h5>
                        <p>
                            A partner meeting with our project partner, Chrissy, was conducted to gather insights and
                            requirements for the project.

                        </p>
                        <div class="mt-4 p-3 bg-blue-50 border-l-4 border-blue-400 text-sm">
                            <p>
                                Chrissy is part of the Friends of Glasgow Botanic Gardens, a volunteer-led charitable
                                organization that supports the conservation, enhancement, and public engagement efforts
                                of
                                the Glasgow Botanic Gardens.
                            </p>
                        </div>

                        <p>Prior to the meeting, the team utlised the "How Might We" framework to better understand the
                            situation and prepare some questions
                            to ask Chrissy. Utilising this framework helped us avoid assumptions and focus interviews
                            around real-world challenges. Some examples include: </p>

                        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 mt-6 mb-6">
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-50 to-blue-100 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-blue-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0">
                                        ?
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium text-sm">How might we support experts in
                                        validating
                                        species data more efficiently?</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-green-50 to-green-100 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-green-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-green-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0">
                                        ?
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium text-sm">How might we help users record accurate
                                        species
                                        details without making the process overwhelming?</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-50 to-purple-100 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-purple-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-center space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-purple-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0">
                                        ?
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium text-sm">How might we reduce errors in manual
                                        species
                                        data entry and improve consistency?</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <p> With these "How Might We" questions in mind, the table below summarizes these questions and
                            their relevance
                            to the
                            project.</p>
                        <div class="bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded">
                            <p><strong>What is the current process of the species identification in
                                    Glasgow?</strong>
                            </p>
                            <div class="flex justify-end mt-4">
                                <div class="max-w-5xl text-right">
                                    <p>Currently, a single expert is responsible for the
                                        identification and recording of the
                                        species. Citizens would report observations of species through email, with the
                                        image
                                        of
                                        the species attached. The expert will then manually identify the species in the
                                        image,
                                        and then record it into a spreadsheet.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded">
                            <p><strong>What is the relevance of iNaturalist with regards to our project?</strong>
                            </p>
                            <div class="flex justify-end mt-4">
                                <div class="max-w-5xl text-right">
                                    <p>It would be good to explore how iNaturalist data can be integrated into the
                                        current process such that there is one centralised database for the species. In
                                        addition to that, requests that come in through current process could be
                                        automatically routed to iNaturalist.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="flex justify-end mt-6">
                            <a href="#"
                                class="inline-flex items-center text-emerald-600 hover:text-emerald-700 font-medium transition-colors duration-200">
                                View the full partner meeting documentation
                                <svg class="w-4 h-4 ml-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2"
                                        d="M9 5l7 7-7 7"></path>
                                </svg>
                            </a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class=" bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8 mt-8">
                    <div class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 space-y-4">
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            Key Insights:
                        </h5>
                        <p>
                            Following the meeting, the team was able to gather key insights that would help
                            shape the direction of the project. The key insights are summarised below:
                        </p>
                        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-1 gap-4 mt-6">
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-50 to-emerald-100 p-5 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-emerald-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-emerald-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0 mt-1">
                                        1
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium">The current process of identifying species in
                                        Glasgow is manual and
                                        time-consuming, with a single expert responsible for the identification and
                                        recording of
                                        species.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-50 to-blue-100 p-5 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-blue-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0 mt-1">
                                        2
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium">There is potential to integrate iNaturalist
                                        data into the current process to
                                        create a centralised database for species identification.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div
                                class="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-50 to-purple-100 p-5 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-purple-400 shadow-sm">
                                <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                                    <div
                                        class="bg-purple-500 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm flex-shrink-0 mt-1">
                                        3
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium">Requests that come in through the current
                                        process could be automatically routed
                                        to iNaturalist, streamlining the identification process.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Ideation Process -->
            <div class="mb-16">
                <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-8">
                    Ideation Process
                </h3>
                <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8">
                    <div class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-6 space-y-4">
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            Initial Brainstorming phase:
                        </h5>

                        <p>
                            Our ideation process was a collaborative effort that involved brainstorming,
                            evaluating, and refining ideas to arrive at a unique solution. We utilized various
                            techniques such as mind mapping, sketching, and group discussions to generate a wide
                            range of concepts.
                            <br> <br>
                            Each team member came up with many initial ideas, which was then placed onto a
                            Action
                            Priority Matrix, as seen in the embedded Miro Board, to determine the most feasible
                            and
                            impactful concepts. The ideas were
                            grouped into four categories, that being:
                        </p>
                        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mt-4">
                            <div class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-emerald-50 rounded-lg">
                                <span
                                    class="bg-emerald-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold">1</span>
                                <span class="text-sm font-medium">Quick Wins (Top Left, Low Effort/High
                                    Impact)</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg">
                                <span
                                    class="bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold">2</span>
                                <span class="text-sm font-medium">Big Projects (Top Right, High Effort/High
                                    Impact)</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-purple-50 rounded-lg">
                                <span
                                    class="bg-purple-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold">3</span>
                                <span class="text-sm font-medium">Fill-Ins (Bottom Left, Low Effort/Low
                                    Impact)</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-orange-50 rounded-lg">
                                <span
                                    class="bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold">4</span>
                                <span class="text-sm font-medium">Time Sinks (Bottom Right, High Effort/Low
                                    Impact)</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <iframe width="100%" height="550"
                            src="https://miro.com/app/live-embed/uXjVK7_XY_E=/?focusWidget=3458764636495739541&embedMode=view_only_without_ui&embedId=480102418784"
                            frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allow="fullscreen; clipboard-read; clipboard-write"
                            allowfullscreen></iframe>
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            Narrowing down ideas:
                        </h5>
                        <p>
                            After brainstorming with a large pool of ideas, we narrowed down our focus to the
                            projects that aligned with our goals and objectives. In addition, we considered the
                            feasibility and effort for each idea, ultimately selected four ideas that stood out.
                            </br></br>
                            The projects that we selected mainly had high impact, and are outlined by the green
                            and
                            orange rectangles in the Miro Board.
                        </p>

                        <iframe width="100%" height="550"
                            src="https://miro.com/app/live-embed/uXjVK7_XY_E=/?focusWidget=3458764636495965465&embedMode=view_only_without_ui&embedId=777527757235"
                            frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allow="fullscreen; clipboard-read; clipboard-write"
                            allowfullscreen></iframe>
                        <div class="mt-4 p-3 bg-blue-50 border-l-4 border-blue-400 text-sm">
                            <p>
                                The idea that is outlined by the orange rectangles was one that we considered.
                                However,
                                after considering the timeframe that the team had to complete the project, we
                                decided to
                                not pursue this idea as it would require too much effort within the timeframe.
                            </p>
                        </div>
                        <!-- <div class="mt-4 p-3 bg-yellow-50 border-l-4 border-yellow-400 text-sm">
                            <strong>A1 Focus:</strong> Show your complete creative process
                            including ideas that were discarded.
                        </div> -->
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700">
                            Final Concept:
                        </h5>
                        <p>
                            The final concept that we decided to pursue was a combination of the ideas that were
                            had
                            the highest impact and most feasible for the team to complete. These ideas were:
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
                        <div class="text-center">
                            <div
                                class="bg-yellow-100 p-6 rounded-lg mb-4 h-48 flex flex-col justify-center items-center">
                                <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üìã</div>
                                <h4 class="font-semibold">An API to feed authenticated biodiversity data to the
                                    Glasgow
                                    City Council's reporting system</h4>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="text-center">
                            <div
                                class="bg-orange-100 p-6 rounded-lg mb-4 h-48 flex flex-col justify-center items-center">
                                <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üï∏Ô∏è</div>
                                <h4 class="font-semibold">A web portal for experts to rapidly verify, comment on, or
                                    correct flagged iNaturalist submissions</h4>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="text-center">
                            <div
                                class="bg-green-100 p-6 rounded-lg mb-4 h-48 flex flex-col justify-center items-center">
                                <div class="text-4xl mb-2">‚úÖ</div>
                                <h4 class="font-semibold">A "triage" system that auto-verified high-confidence
                                    sightings
                                    of common species, leaving only challenging IDs for experts</h4>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
</body>

</html>

================
File: index.html
================

      content="Botaniq - Team 08 University of Glasgow project focusing on Glasgow Botanic Garden, documenting our design thinking process and journey"
    />

        >
          Botaniq
        </h1>
        <p
          class="text-xl md:text-2xl text-white mb-8 max-w-2xl mx-auto drop-shadow-md"
        >
          Team 08's comprehensive showcase focusing on Glasgow Botanic Garden -
          documenting our design thinking process from problem identification to
          final reflections
        </p>

        >

            Explore Our Journey
          </a>

          </a>

    <!-- Section 1: Problem & Solution -->
    <section id="problem" class="py-20 bg-white">
      <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6">
        <div class="text-center mb-16">
          <h2
            class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-playfair font-bold text-emerald-900 mb-4"
          >
            The Problem & Our Solution
          </h2>
          <div class="w-24 h-1 bg-emerald-600 mx-auto"></div>
        </div>

        <!-- Problem Statement Section -->
        <div id="problem-statement" class="mb-16">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Problem Statement
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-red-500 mx-auto"></div>
          </div>

          <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div
              class="bg-red-50 border-l-4 border-red-400 p-8 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg"
            >
              <h4 class="font-bold text-red-800 text-2xl mb-6 text-center">
                Biodiversity Data Management Crisis in Glasgow
              </h4>

              <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-6">
                <div class="text-center">
                  <div class="bg-red-100 p-4 rounded-lg mb-3">
                    <div class="text-3xl mb-2">‚è±Ô∏è</div>
                    <h5 class="font-semibold text-red-800">Time-Consuming</h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-red-700">
                      Manual data entry into spreadsheets
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="text-center">
                  <div class="bg-red-100 p-4 rounded-lg mb-3">
                    <div class="text-3xl mb-2">üìè</div>
                    <h5 class="font-semibold text-red-800">Limited Scale</h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-red-700">
                      Difficulty tracking city-wide trends
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="text-center">
                  <div class="bg-red-100 p-4 rounded-lg mb-3">
                    <div class="text-3xl mb-2">üîí</div>
                    <h5 class="font-semibold text-red-800">
                      Underutilized Data
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-red-700">
                      iNaturalist data not integrated
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-red-200 mb-4">
                <div class="flex items-center mb-3">
                  <span class="text-2xl mr-3">üö®</span>
                  <h5 class="font-bold text-red-800 text-lg">
                    Critical Bottleneck
                  </h5>
                </div>
                <p class="text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  <strong>Only one domain expert/specialist</strong> is
                  single-handedly processing all biodiversity entries manually
                  on a <strong>quarterly basis</strong>.
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-gray-600 italic">
                  Source: Chrissy, Friends of Glasgow Botanic Gardens
                </p>
              </div>

              <div class="bg-red-100 p-4 rounded-lg text-center">
                <p class="font-medium text-red-800">
                  <strong>Target Audiences:</strong> General public, city
                  stakeholders/decision-makers, and domain experts/specialists
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Background Context Section -->
        <div id="background-context" class="mb-16">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Background Context
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-blue-600 mx-auto"></div>
          </div>

          <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div
              class="bg-blue-50 border-l-4 border-blue-400 p-8 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg"
            >
              <h4 class="font-bold text-blue-800 text-2xl mb-6 text-center">
                Glasgow Botanic Garden's Biodiversity Challenge
              </h4>

              <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6">
                <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-blue-200">
                  <h5
                    class="font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-3 flex items-center"
                  >
                    <span class="text-lg mr-2">üåø</span> Current State
                  </h5>
                  <ul class="text-sm text-blue-700 space-y-2">
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ Glasgow Botanic Garden houses over 12,000 plant species
                    </li>
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ Manual biodiversity tracking via traditional
                      spreadsheets
                    </li>
                    <li>‚Ä¢ Single domain expert processing quarterly data</li>
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ Limited integration with citizen science platforms
                    </li>
                  </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-blue-200">
                  <h5
                    class="font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-3 flex items-center"
                  >
                    <span class="text-lg mr-2">üìä</span> Key Stakeholders
                  </h5>
                  <ul class="text-sm text-blue-700 space-y-2">
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢
                      <strong>Friends of Glasgow Botanic Gardens:</strong>
                      Community advocacy
                    </li>
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ <strong>Domain Experts:</strong> Species identification
                      specialists
                    </li>
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ <strong>City Decision-makers:</strong> Urban
                      biodiversity policy
                    </li>
                    <li>
                      ‚Ä¢ <strong>General Public:</strong> Citizen science
                      contributors
                    </li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-blue-200">
                <div class="flex items-center mb-3">
                  <span class="text-2xl mr-3">üéØ</span>
                  <h5 class="font-bold text-blue-800 text-lg">
                    Strategic Importance
                  </h5>
                </div>
                <p class="text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Glasgow's commitment to environmental sustainability requires
                  accurate, real-time biodiversity monitoring to inform urban
                  planning decisions and conservation efforts across the city's
                  green spaces.
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-gray-600 italic">
                  Supporting Glasgow's Net Zero by 2030 goals and biodiversity
                  action plans.
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Pre-existing Solution Section -->
        <div id="existing-solution" class="mb-16">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Pre-existing Solutions
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-purple-600 mx-auto"></div>
          </div>

          <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div
              class="bg-purple-50 border-l-4 border-purple-400 p-8 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg"
            >
              <h4 class="font-bold text-purple-800 text-2xl mb-6 text-center">
                Current Tools & Limitations
              </h4>

              <div class="space-y-6">
                <!-- iNaturalist -->
                <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-purple-200">
                  <div class="flex items-center justify-between mb-4">
                    <div class="flex items-center">
                      <span class="text-2xl mr-3">üî¨</span>
                      <h5 class="font-bold text-purple-800 text-lg">
                        iNaturalist Platform
                      </h5>
                    </div>
                    <div
                      class="text-sm bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-3 py-1 rounded-full font-medium"
                    >
                      Widely Used
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                    <div>
                      <h6 class="font-semibold text-green-700 mb-2">
                        ‚úÖ Strengths
                      </h6>
                      <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Large citizen science community</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ AI-powered species suggestions</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Expert verification system</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Rich photographic database</li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                      <h6 class="font-semibold text-red-700 mb-2">
                        ‚ùå Limitations
                      </h6>
                      <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                        <li>‚Ä¢ No integration with local systems</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Generic, not Glasgow-specific</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Manual data extraction required</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Limited customization for experts</li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Traditional Methods -->
                <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-purple-200">
                  <div class="flex items-center justify-between mb-4">
                    <div class="flex items-center">
                      <span class="text-2xl mr-3">üìã</span>
                      <h5 class="font-bold text-purple-800 text-lg">
                        Traditional Spreadsheet Method
                      </h5>
                    </div>
                    <div
                      class="text-sm bg-red-100 text-red-800 px-3 py-1 rounded-full font-medium"
                    >
                      Current Method
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                    <div>
                      <h6 class="font-semibold text-green-700 mb-2">
                        ‚úÖ Strengths
                      </h6>
                      <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Familiar to domain experts</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Complete control over data structure</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ No dependency on external platforms</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Customizable for specific needs</li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                      <h6 class="font-semibold text-red-700 mb-2">
                        ‚ùå Limitations
                      </h6>
                      <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Extremely time-consuming</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Single point of failure (one expert)</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ No automation or AI assistance</li>
                        <li>‚Ä¢ Limited scalability</li>
                      </ul>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Gap Analysis -->
                <div
                  class="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-100 to-blue-100 p-6 rounded-lg border border-purple-300"
                >
                  <div class="text-center">
                    <span class="text-3xl mb-3 block">üîç</span>
                    <h5 class="font-bold text-purple-900 text-lg mb-3">
                      The Gap
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-purple-800 font-medium">
                      No existing solution bridges the gap between powerful
                      citizen science platforms and the specific needs of
                      Glasgow's biodiversity experts for efficient, AI-assisted
                      local data management.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Research Section -->
        <div class="mb-16">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Research Insights
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-indigo-600 mx-auto"></div>
            <p class="text-lg text-gray-600 mt-4 max-w-3xl mx-auto">
              To validate our solution approach, we conducted extensive research
              on existing biodiversity platforms, focusing on iNaturalist as the
              leading community-driven biodiversity database.
            </p>
          </div>

          <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto">
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              <!-- Left Column: iNaturalist Platform & AI Technology -->
              <div class="space-y-6 flex flex-col">
                <div
                  class="bg-white border-l-4 border-indigo-400 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg p-6 flex-1"
                >
                  <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
                    <div class="bg-indigo-100 p-3 rounded-full mr-4">
                      <div class="text-2xl">üåç</div>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="font-bold text-indigo-800 text-lg">
                      Understanding iNaturalist
                    </h4>
                  </div>
                  <div class="space-y-3">
                    <p class="text-gray-700">
                      <strong>What is iNaturalist?</strong><br /><br />
                      It's a global online platform where citizens, scientists,
                      and nature enthusiasts share observations of plants,
                      animals, and other organisms. Think of it as a "social
                      network for nature" where people upload photos of wildlife
                      they encounter.
                    </p>
                    <p class="text-gray-700">
                      The platform has grown to become
                      <strong
                        >one of the largest active online communities</strong
                      >
                      for biodiversity recording and information sharing, with
                      millions of observations from around the world.
                    </p>
                    <div class="bg-indigo-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                      <h5 class="font-semibold text-indigo-800 mb-2">
                        Why This Matters for Our Project:
                      </h5>
                      <p class="text-sm text-indigo-700">
                        iNaturalist proves that community-driven biodiversity
                        data collection works at scale. We can use their
                        approach as a guide and potentially integrate their data
                        into our Glasgow-focused solution, giving us access to
                        existing observations in the area.
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div
                  class="bg-white border-l-4 border-orange-400 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg p-6 flex-1"
                >
                  <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
                    <div class="bg-orange-100 p-3 rounded-full mr-4">
                      <div class="text-2xl">ü§ñ</div>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="font-bold text-orange-800 text-lg">
                      AI Technology Implementation
                    </h4>
                  </div>
                  <div class="space-y-4">
                    <p class="text-gray-700">
                      <strong>Does iNaturalist use AI?</strong> <br /><br />
                      Yes. They make use of computer vision technology that can
                      automatically suggest species identifications from photos.
                    </p>

                    <div class="space-y-3">
                      <div class="bg-orange-50 p-4 rounded">
                        <h5 class="font-semibold text-orange-800 mb-2">
                          Hybrid AI System:
                        </h5>
                        <div class="space-y-2">
                          <p class="text-sm text-orange-700">
                            <strong>Local Processing:</strong> Basic AI works
                            offline on your device, providing instant
                            suggestions even without internet
                          </p>
                          <p class="text-sm text-orange-700">
                            <strong>Cloud Enhancement:</strong> With access to
                            internet, a more powerful cloud-based AI provides
                            improved accuracy and can identify more species
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      </div>

                      <div class="bg-orange-100 p-4 rounded text-center">
                        <div class="text-2xl font-bold text-orange-800">
                          88.3%
                        </div>
                        <p class="text-sm text-orange-700 font-semibold">
                          AI model accuracy rate
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-xs text-orange-600 mt-1">
                          Covers over 1,000 species
                        </p>
                        <a
                          href="https://www.inaturalist.org/blog/110120-new-computer-vision-model-2-21-with-over-1-000-new-taxa"
                          target="_blank"
                          class="text-xs text-blue-600 underline block mt-1"
                          >Technical model details</a
                        >
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="bg-orange-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                      <h5 class="font-semibold text-orange-800 mb-2">
                        Validation for Our Approach:
                      </h5>
                      <p class="text-sm text-orange-700">
                        iNaturalist's success with computer vision AI proves
                        that AI-assisted species identification is not only
                        viable but highly effective. We can adopt similar
                        technology for our Glasgow Botanic Garden solution.
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Right Column: Data Quality & Implementation Path -->
              <div class="space-y-6 flex flex-col">
                <div
                  class="bg-white border-l-4 border-green-400 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg p-6 flex-1"
                >
                  <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
                    <div class="bg-green-100 p-3 rounded-full mr-4">
                      <div class="text-2xl">üìä</div>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="font-bold text-green-800 text-lg">
                      Data Quality & Reliability
                    </h4>
                  </div>
                  <div class="space-y-4">
                    <p class="text-gray-700">
                      <strong>How does iNaturalist ensure data accuracy?</strong
                      ><br /><br />
                      They use a "research grade" system that requires community
                      verification before data is considered scientifically
                      reliable.
                    </p>

                    <div class="space-y-3">
                      <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded">
                        <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-1">
                          Community Verification Process:
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                          At least 2 independent experts must agree on the
                          species identification, with a minimum of ‚Öî consensus
                          required
                        </p>
                      </div>
                      <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded">
                        <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-1">
                          Photo Quality Standards:
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                          Images must be clear, geo-tagged with location data,
                          dated, and show wild (not captive) organisms
                        </p>
                      </div>
                      <div class="bg-green-100 p-4 rounded text-center">
                        <div class="text-2xl font-bold text-green-800">95%</div>
                        <p class="text-sm text-green-700 font-semibold">
                          Research-grade accuracy rate
                        </p>
                        <a
                          href="https://www.inaturalist.org/blog/89255-we-estimate-the-accuracy-of-research-grade-observations-to-be-95-correct"
                          target="_blank"
                          class="text-xs text-blue-600 underline block mt-1"
                          >Official accuracy study</a
                        >
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="bg-green-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                      <h5 class="font-semibold text-green-800 mb-2">
                        Implications for Our Solution:
                      </h5>
                      <p class="text-sm text-green-700">
                        With 95% accuracy, iNaturalist's data is scientifically
                        trustworthy and suitable for integration into our
                        application. This validates our approach of using
                        community-contributed data with expert verification.
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div
                  class="bg-white border-l-4 border-purple-400 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg p-6 flex-1"
                >
                  <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
                    <div class="bg-purple-100 p-3 rounded-full mr-4">
                      <div class="text-2xl">üîó</div>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="font-bold text-purple-800 text-lg">
                      Implementation Pathway
                    </h4>
                  </div>
                  <div class="space-y-4">
                    <p class="text-gray-700">
                      <strong>How can we leverage iNaturalist?</strong
                      ><br /><br />
                      We discovered that iNaturalist provides an API
                      (Application Programming Interface) - essentially a way
                      for our application to connect with and access their data.
                    </p>

                    <div class="space-y-3">
                      <div class="bg-purple-50 p-3 rounded">
                        <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-purple-800 mb-1">
                          ‚úì Data Reliability Confirmed
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-purple-700">
                          95% accuracy rate validates that iNaturalist data is
                          scientifically sound and suitable for our application
                        </p>
                      </div>
                      <div class="bg-purple-50 p-3 rounded">
                        <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-purple-800 mb-1">
                          ‚úì AI Technology Proven
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-purple-700">
                          88.3% accuracy demonstrates that computer vision for
                          species identification is mature and effective
                        </p>
                      </div>
                      <div class="bg-purple-50 p-3 rounded">
                        <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-purple-800 mb-1">
                          ‚úì API Access Available
                        </p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-purple-700">
                          Technical integration is feasible - we can pull
                          Glasgow-area observations directly into our system
                        </p>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="bg-purple-100 p-4 rounded text-center">
                      <h5 class="font-semibold text-purple-800 mb-2">
                        Research Conclusion
                      </h5>
                      <p class="text-sm text-purple-700">
                        iNaturalist provides a
                        <strong>solid, validated foundation</strong> for our
                        biodiversity monitoring solution. Their proven success
                        gives us confidence in our technical approach.
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Summary Footer -->
            <div
              class="mt-8 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-50 to-purple-50 border border-indigo-200 rounded-lg p-6"
            >
              <div class="text-center">
                <h5 class="font-bold text-gray-800 text-lg mb-3">
                  Key Research Takeaways
                </h5>
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-sm">
                  <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg">
                    <div class="font-semibold text-indigo-700 mb-1">
                      Proven Model
                    </div>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                      Community-driven biodiversity data collection works at
                      massive scale
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg">
                    <div class="font-semibold text-green-700 mb-1">
                      Quality Assured
                    </div>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                      Rigorous verification processes ensure scientific
                      reliability
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg">
                    <div class="font-semibold text-orange-700 mb-1">
                      AI Ready
                    </div>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                      Computer vision technology is mature and deployment-ready
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Solution Section -->
        <div class="mb-16">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <h3 class="text-3xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Proposed Solution
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-emerald-600 mx-auto"></div>
          </div>

          <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto">
            <div
              class="bg-emerald-50 border-l-4 border-emerald-400 p-8 rounded-r-lg shadow-lg"
            >
              <h4 class="font-bold text-emerald-800 text-2xl mb-6 text-center">
                AI-Powered Biodiversity Data Integration Platform
              </h4>

              <div
                class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-emerald-200 mb-6"
              >
                <p class="text-lg text-gray-700 text-center mb-4">
                  A comprehensive four-part system that revolutionizes Glasgow's
                  biodiversity monitoring
                </p>
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                  <div
                    class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-emerald-50 rounded-lg"
                  >
                    <span
                      class="bg-emerald-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold"
                      >1</span
                    >
                    <span class="text-sm font-medium"
                      >Automated data collection via iNaturalist API</span
                    >
                  </div>
                  <div
                    class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg"
                  >
                    <span
                      class="bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold"
                      >2</span
                    >
                    <span class="text-sm font-medium"
                      >AI-assisted pre-screening for accuracy</span
                    >
                  </div>
                  <div
                    class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-purple-50 rounded-lg"
                  >
                    <span
                      class="bg-purple-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold"
                      >3</span
                    >
                    <span class="text-sm font-medium"
                      >Expert verification with active learning</span
                    >
                  </div>
                  <div
                    class="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 bg-orange-50 rounded-lg"
                  >
                    <span
                      class="bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center font-bold"
                      >4</span
                    >
                    <span class="text-sm font-medium"
                      >Customized dashboards for all stakeholders</span
                    >
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                <div class="space-y-4">
                  <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200">
                    <h5
                      class="font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-2 flex items-center"
                    >
                      <span class="text-lg mr-2">ü§ñ</span> Automated
                      Intelligence
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-blue-700">
                      ML models analyze images and predict species accuracy
                      (e.g., "User: Foxglove | Model: Foxglove (92%)")
                    </p>
                  </div>

                  <div
                    class="bg-purple-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-purple-200"
                  >
                    <h5
                      class="font-semibold text-purple-800 mb-2 flex items-center"
                    >
                      <span class="text-lg mr-2">üë©‚Äçüî¨</span> Expert Verification
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-purple-700">
                      Tinder-like interface for quick expert review with active
                      learning that improves over time
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div class="space-y-4">
                  <div
                    class="bg-orange-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-orange-200"
                  >
                    <h5
                      class="font-semibold text-orange-800 mb-2 flex items-center"
                    >
                      <span class="text-lg mr-2">üìä</span> Decision Support
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-orange-700">
                      Real-time dashboards with AI alerts for decision-makers
                      (e.g., invasive species tracking)
                    </p>
                  </div>

                  <div
                    class="bg-green-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-green-200"
                  >
                    <h5
                      class="font-semibold text-green-800 mb-2 flex items-center"
                    >
                      <span class="text-lg mr-2">üåç</span> Public Engagement
                    </h5>
                    <p class="text-sm text-green-700">
                      Citizen-friendly portal with photo ID, location-based
                      exploration, and gamification
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div class="mt-6 bg-emerald-100 p-4 rounded-lg text-center">
                <p class="font-medium text-emerald-800">
                  <strong>Result:</strong> Transform quarterly manual processing
                  into real-time, scalable biodiversity monitoring
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Clarify doubts with the project specifications</li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                <div class="space-y-6">
                                    <div>
                                        <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Key Discussion Points</h5>
                                        <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Current process of species identification</li>
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Potential integration with iNaturalist for automated verification</li>
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Streamlining data collection into a centralized database</li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                                <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Questions Asked</h5>
                                <div class="space-y-3">
                                    <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg">
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium mb-1">Q (Team): Can you walk us
                                            through
                                            step by step, through the process of recording?</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">A (Chrissy): An expert is tasked to manage the
                                            records of
                                            observations of species in Glasgow. This includes manually identifying the
                                            species, and recording the observations in a spreadsheet according to its
                                            location within Glasgow.
                                        </p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg">
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium mb-1">Q (Team): Who is in charge of
                                            managing the records?</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">A (Chrissy): There is only one expert in
                                            Glasgow who is
                                            responsible for managing the entire species identification process.</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg">
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium mb-1">Q (Team): What is the current
                                            process
                                            of species identification requests by external parties?</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">A (Chrissy): An email is sent to the expert
                                            with the
                                            details of the request, including the image of the species, and the location
                                            of the observation. The expert then assesses then identifies the species
                                            based on the image and records it on to the spreadsheet.</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg">
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium mb-1">Q (Team): What is the
                                            relevance of iNaturalist with regards to our project?</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">A (Chrissy): It would be good to explore how
                                            iNaturalist data can be integrated into the
                                            current process such that there is one centralised database for the species.
                                            In
                                            addition to that, requests that come in through current process could be
                                            automatically routed to iNaturalist.</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg">
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium mb-1">Q (Team): After the
                                            iNaturalist verification process,
                                            is there a need for an extra layer of authentication?
                                        </p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">A (Chrissy): It would not be required. However,
                                            it would
                                            be necessary to have an explanation on how iNaturalist verification works in
                                            order to be transparent.</p>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-6">
                                <div>
                                    <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Key Insights</h5>
                                    <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ A single expert is responsible for the entire species identification
                                            process</li>
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ The current species identification process is time-consuming</li>
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ Integrating iNaturalist could streamline the process</li>
                                    </ul>
                                </div>

                                <div>
                                    <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Action Items</h5>
                                    <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ Start brainstorming ideas</li>
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ Explore iNaturalist integration possibilities</li>
                                    </ul>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <!-- Meeting 2 -->
                        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg p-4 m-8 shadow-sm">
                            <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
                                <h4 class="text-xl font-semibold text-emerald-700">Meeting #2 - Progress Review</h4>
                                <span class="px-4 py-2 bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 text-sm rounded-full">
                                    5th August 2025
                                </span>
                            </div>

                            <div>
                                <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Attendees</h5>
                                <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">
                                    <strong>Chrissy</strong>
                                    </br>
                                    Friends of Glasgow Botanic Gardens
                                    </br></br>
                                    <strong>Members of Team 8</strong>
                                </p>
                            </div>

                            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-6">
                                <div class="space-y-6">


                                    <div>
                                        <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Progress Updates</h5>
                                        <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Presentation of project poster, detailing the proposed solution</li>
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Presentation of prototype, showcasing key features and functionality
                                            </li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>


                                </div>

                                <div class="space-y-6">
                                    <div>
                                        <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Partner Feedback</h5>
                                        <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ Prototype and poster was detailed very thoroughly</li>
                                            <li>‚Ä¢ It would be good to detail the workflow of the prototype more clearly,
                                                including arrows to detail the species identification workflow</li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                <div>
                                    <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-3">Revised Action Items</h5>
                                    <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                        <li>‚Ä¢ Refine prototype to detail user workflow more clearly</li>
                                    </ul>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- User Research Section -->
            <div class="mt-8">
                <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 to-orange-100 rounded-lg p-8">
                    <div class="text-4xl mb-4">üîç</div>
                    <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">
                        User Research
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-700 mb-6">
                        Research findings and user engagement data
                    </p>

                    <!-- User Feedback Video Section -->
                    <div class="mb-8">
                        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg p-6 shadow-sm">
                            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
                                <!-- User Feedback Content -->
                                <div>
                                    <h4 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700 mb-4 flex items-center">
                                        <span class="text-2xl mr-2">üë¶üèº</span>
                                        User Feedback & Testing Results
                                    </h4>
                                    <div class="space-y-4">
                                        <div>
                                            <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Key User Insights</h5>
                                            <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                                <li>‚Ä¢ In the page where the expert verifies the identity of the species,
                                                    if both iNaturalist and the model are wrong, there is no need for an
                                                    additional modal to ask which is wrong, as both are wrong</li>
                                                <li>‚Ä¢ In the public page, when the user uses the image upload to
                                                    identify a species, there is no need to show multiple species that
                                                    the model has identified. Rather, show the species which the model
                                                    identified with high confidence</li>
                                            </ul>
                                        </div>
                                        <!-- 
                                        <div>
                                            <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">User Quotes</h5>
                                            <div class="space-y-2">
                                                <blockquote
                                                    class="text-sm text-gray-600 italic border-l-4 border-emerald-200 pl-3">
                                                    "[Add direct quote from user feedback]"
                                                </blockquote>
                                                <blockquote
                                                    class="text-sm text-gray-600 italic border-l-4 border-emerald-200 pl-3">
                                                    "[Add another meaningful user quote]"
                                                </blockquote>
                                            </div>
                                        </div> -->

                                        <div>
                                            <h5 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Design Improvements Made</h5>
                                            <ul class="text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1">
                                                <li>‚Ä¢ Remove the modal asking which is wrong when both iNaturalist and
                                                    the model are incorrect.</li>
                                                <li>‚Ä¢ Removed multiple species display when identifying a species
                                                    via image upload, showing only the one with high confidence
                                                    instead.</li>
                                            </ul>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                <!-- Video Section -->
                                <div class="flex flex-col">
                                    <h4 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700 mb-4">
                                        User Feedback Video
                                    </h4>
                                    <div class="flex-1 flex flex-col">
                                        <!-- Embedded YouTube Video -->
                                        <div
                                            class="bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 to-emerald-100 p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-2 border-emerald-200">
                                            <div class="aspect-video w-full rounded-lg overflow-hidden bg-black">
                                                <iframe width="100%" height="100%"
                                                    src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9wIYmuYOa9E"
                                                    title="User Feedback Session" frameborder="0"
                                                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"
                                                    referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen
                                                    class="rounded-lg">
                                                </iframe>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="mt-3 text-center">
                                                <h5 class="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-1">User Feedback Session</h5>
                                                <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">Real users interacting with our
                                                    prototype and providing valuable feedback</p>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <div class="mt-4 p-3 bg-yellow-50 border-l-4 border-yellow-400 text-xs">
                                            <strong>Portfolio Evidence:</strong> This video demonstrates real user
                                            interaction with our prototype and captures authentic feedback for
                                            evaluation.
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- Figma Prototype Section -->
                            <div>
                                <h4 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700 mb-4 flex items-center">
                                    <span class="text-2xl mr-2">üé®</span>

                                </h4>
                                <p class="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4">

    <div id="video-modal" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true"
        class="hidden overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden fixed top-0 right-0 left-0 z-50 justify-center items-center w-full md:inset-0 h-[calc(100%-1rem)] max-h-full">
        <div class="relative p-4 w-full max-w-4xl max-h-full">
            <!-- Modal content -->
            <div class="relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm">
                <!-- Modal header -->
                <div
                    class="flex items-center justify-between p-4 md:p-5 rounded-t dark:border-gray-600 border-gray-200">
                    <h3 id="modal-title" class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900">
                        Video Title
                    </h3>
                    <button type="button"
                        class="text-gray-400 bg-transparent hover:bg-gray-200 hover:text-gray-900 rounded-lg text-sm w-8 h-8 ms-auto inline-flex justify-center items-center dark:hover:bg-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white"
                        data-modal-hide="video-modal">
                        <svg class="w-3 h-3" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none"
                            viewBox="0 0 14 14">
                            <path stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2"
                                d="m1 1 6 6m0 0 6 6M7 7l6-6M7 7l-6 6" />
                        </svg>
                        <span class="sr-only">Close modal</span>
                    </button>
                </div>
                <!-- Modal body -->
                <div class="p-4 md:p-5 space-y-4">
                    <iframe id="video-iframe" width="100%" height="500" src="about:blank" title="YouTube video player"
                        frameborder="0"
                        allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"
                        referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Custom JavaScript -->
    <script src="script.js"></script>

    <!-- Flowbite JS -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/flowbite@3.1.2/dist/flowbite.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>

================
File: prototype.html
================

                      for alignment.

                          interactions</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-5 border border-purple-200">
