                      <div class="w-8 h-8 bg-purple-100 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center mr-3 flex-shrink-0">
                        <span class="text-purple-600 text-lg">üß©</span>
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h5 class="font-bold text-purple-800 text-sm uppercase tracking-wide">Component Development</h5>
                        <p class="text-gray-700 text-sm mt-1">Building reusable UI elements and interaction patterns</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                  <!-- Iteration & Understanding -->
                  <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-purple-600 rounded-xl p-4 text-white">
                    <div class="flex items-center mb-2">
                      <span class="text-2xl mr-3">üîÑ</span>
                      <span class="font-bold text-sm uppercase tracking-wide">Iteration Breakthrough</span>
                    </div>
                    <p class="text-sm">Mid-fi prototyping uncovered different mental models within our team, leading to
                      essential realignment discussions</p>
                  </div>

                  <!-- Outcomes -->
                  <div class="text-center pt-2">
                    <div class="inline-flex items-center bg-purple-50 px-4 py-2 rounded-full">
                      <span class="text-purple-600 text-xs font-medium">User flow clarity ‚Ä¢ Team alignment ‚Ä¢ Solution
                        consensus</span>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Hi-fi Phase -->
            <div class="relative group flex">
              <!-- Timeline Connector -->
              <div
                class="hidden lg:block absolute top-24 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 w-8 h-8 bg-green-500 rounded-full border-4 border-white shadow-lg z-10">
              </div>

                  <img src="assets/hifi-verication-stats.png" alt="Hi-Fi Verification Stats"
                    class="absolute block w-full" style="
                        object-fit: contain;
                        max-height: 100%;
                        max-width: 100%;
                      " />
                  <div
                    class="absolute top-4 left-4 bg-slate-400/80 backdrop-blur-sm text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                    Verification Stats
                  </div>
                </div>
                <!-- Item 9 -->
                <div class="hidden duration-700 ease-in-out" data-carousel-item>
                  <img src="assets/hifi-verifying-page.png" alt="Hi-Fi Verifying Page" class="absolute block w-full"
                    style="
                        object-fit: contain;
                        max-height: 100%;
                        max-width: 100%;
                      " />
                  <div
                    class="absolute top-4 left-4 bg-slate-400/80 backdrop-blur-sm text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                    Verifying Page
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <!-- Slider indicators -->
              <div class="absolute z-30 flex -translate-x-1/2 bottom-5 left-1/2 space-x-3 rtl:space-x-reverse">
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="0"></button>
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="1"></button>
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="2"></button>
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="3"></button>
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="4"></button>
                <button type="button" class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white"
                  data-carousel-slide-to="5"></button>

                  data-carousel-slide-to="6"></button>

                  data-carousel-slide-to="8"></button>
              </div>

                class="absolute top-0 start-0 z-30 flex items-center justify-center h-full px-4 cursor-pointer group focus:outline-none"
                data-carousel-prev>

                  class="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-emerald-400/70 group-hover:bg-emerald-500/80 group-focus:ring-4 group-focus:ring-emerald-200 group-focus:outline-none">
                  <svg class="w-4 h-4 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 6 10">

                </span>

                  <svg class="w-4 h-4 text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 6 10">

                  </svg>

                </span>
              </button>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-8 space-y-4">
              <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl p-6 max-w-4xl mx-auto">
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-center">
                  <div class="flex flex-col items-center">
                    <div class="w-12 h-12 bg-emerald-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-2">
                      <span class="text-2xl">üé≠</span>

                    <p class="text-xs text-emerald-600">Clickable flows</p>

                  <div class="flex flex-col items-center">
                    <div class="w-12 h-12 bg-emerald-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-2">
                      <span class="text-2xl">üöÄ</span>
                    </div>
                    <p class="text-sm font-semibold text-emerald-800">Test Ready</p>
                    <p class="text-xs text-emerald-600">User testing ready</p>

                </div>
                <p class="text-emerald-700 text-center mt-4 text-sm leading-relaxed">
                  Production-ready prototypes with complete visual design, interactions, and user testing capabilities
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Evolution Summary -->
        <div class="mt-16 bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-900 via-slate-800 to-gray-900 rounded-2xl p-8 md:p-12 text-white">
          <div class="text-center mb-10">

  <!-- Section 2: Prototyping -->
  <section id="prototyping" class="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-teal-50 to-emerald-50">
    <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6">
      <!-- Section Header -->
      <div class="text-center mb-20">
        <div class="inline-block p-2 bg-emerald-100 rounded-full mb-6">
          <div class="w-12 h-12 bg-emerald-600 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
            <span class="text-white text-2xl">üõ†Ô∏è</span>
          </div>
        </div>
        <h2 class="text-5xl md:text-6xl font-playfair font-bold text-emerald-900 mb-6">
          Prototyping Techniques
        </h2>
        <div class="w-32 h-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-400 to-teal-500 mx-auto mb-8"></div>
        <p class="text-xl text-gray-700 max-w-3xl mx-auto leading-relaxed">
          Our specialized approach combines three innovative techniques
          designed specifically for conservation technology and community
          engagement
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Three Technique Cards -->
      <div class="grid lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 mb-16">
        <!-- Progressive Disclosure -->
        <div
          class="group bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-2 border border-gray-100">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div
              class="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-400 to-indigo-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-6 group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300">
              <span class="text-white text-4xl">üëÅÔ∏è</span>
            </div>
            <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Progressive Disclosure
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-400 to-indigo-600 mx-auto mb-6"></div>
          </div>
          <p class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 text-center">
            Complex functionality revealed gradually based on user confidence
            and expertise level, preventing overwhelming novice users while
            maintaining advanced capabilities for experts.
          </p>
        </div>

        <!-- Local-First Design -->
        <div
          class="group bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-2 border border-gray-100">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div
              class="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-400 to-emerald-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-6 group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300">
              <span class="text-white text-4xl">üåç</span>
            </div>
            <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
              Local-First Design
            </h3>
            <div class="w-16 h-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-400 to-emerald-600 mx-auto mb-6"></div>
          </div>
          <p class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 text-center">
            Every interface element, content piece, and interaction pattern
            optimized for Glasgow's specific cultural context, species
            ecosystem, and community characteristics.
          </p>

        </div>

        <!-- Impact Transparency -->
        <div
          class="group bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-2 border border-gray-100">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">

              class="w-20 h-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-amber-400 to-amber-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-6 group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300">
              <span class="text-white text-4xl">üìä</span>

              Impact Transparency
            </h3>

          </div>
          <p class="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed mb-8 text-center">
            Clear, immediate feedback connecting individual actions to
            measurable conservation outcomes and community goals.
          </p>

        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Implementation Strategy -->
      <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-900 to-gray-800 rounded-3xl p-12 text-white">
        <div class="text-center mb-12">
          <h3 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-4">Implementation Strategy</h3>
          <p class="text-gray-300 text-lg max-w-2xl mx-auto">

            maximum impact
          </p>
        </div>

        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
          <div class="text-center">

              class="w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-400 to-emerald-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
              <span class="text-white text-2xl font-bold">1</span>
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Research & Context</h4>
            <p class="text-gray-400 text-sm">
              Applied local-first principles by understanding Glasgow City Council's
              current process and workflow
            </p>
          </div>

          <div class="text-center">
            <div
              class="w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-400 to-indigo-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
              <span class="text-white text-2xl font-bold">2</span>
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Gradual Complexity</h4>
            <p class="text-gray-400 text-sm">
              Implemented progressive disclosure to accommodate users from
              novice to expert levels
            </p>
          </div>

          <div class="text-center">
            <div
              class="w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-amber-400 to-amber-600 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
              <span class="text-white text-2xl font-bold">3</span>
            </div>
            <h4 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Feedback Loops</h4>
            <p class="text-gray-400 text-sm">
              Clear, immediate feedback connecting individual actions to measurable conservation outcomes and community
              goals
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

  </section>

  <!-- Section 4: Usability Testing + User Feedback -->
  <section id="testing" class="py-20 bg-white">
    <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6">
      <div class="text-center mb-16">
        <h2 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-playfair font-bold text-emerald-900 mb-4">
          User Feedback
        </h2>
        <div class="w-24 h-1 bg-emerald-600 mx-auto"></div>
        <p class="text-lg text-gray-700 mt-6 max-w-2xl mx-auto">
          Iterative improvements based on real user feedback and testing
          insights
        </p>
      </div>


      <!-- User Feedback Iteration 1 -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-blue-100 rounded-lg p-8 mb-8 relative">
          <!-- Interface Type Badge -->
          <div
            class="absolute top-4 right-4 bg-blue-700 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold shadow-lg">
            Expert-Facing Interface
          </div>
          <div class="flex items-start space-x-4 mb-6">
            <div
              class="bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-full w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
              1
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-blue-900 mb-2">
                Ambiguous Inteface
              </h3>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-l-4 border-blue-600">
                <p class="text-gray-700 italic mb-2">
                  "What if your model and iNaturalist suggest different
                  identifications? If the expert clicks agree/disagree, which
                  suggestion is he accepting?"
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-blue-700 font-medium">
                  - User Testing Participant
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Image Comparison Slider 1 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 mb-8">
          <div class="relative w-full max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div class="image-comparison-slider" id="slider1">
              <div class="image-comparison-container">
                <!-- Before/After Labels -->
                <div
                  class="before-label absolute top-4 left-4 bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  BEFORE
                </div>
                <div
                  class="after-label absolute top-4 right-4 bg-emerald-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  AFTER
                </div>

                <div class="image-comparison-before">
                  <img src="assets/comparison-1-after.jpeg" alt="After: Clear separation of AI"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-after">
                  <img src="assets/comparison-1-before.jpg" alt="Before: Unclear model vs iNaturalist distinction"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-slider-handle" data-slider="slider1">
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-line"></div>
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-button">
                    <svg width="56" height="40" viewBox="0 0 56 40" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M16 12L8 20L16 28" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                      <path d="M40 28L48 20L40 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="mt-6 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
            <div class="text-center bg-red-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üîç</div>
              <p class="text-gray-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Ambiguity with Agree Button
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-gray-600 mt-1">
                Users couldn't tell which suggestion they were
                agreeing or disagreeing to
              </p>
            </div>
            <div class="text-center bg-emerald-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">‚úÖ</div>
              <p class="text-emerald-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Clear separation of Agree Button
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-emerald-600 mt-1">
                Distinct sections for "Our Model" vs "iNaturalist"
                recommendations
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Solution Box for Item 1 -->
          <div class="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-100 to-green-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">üí° Solution Implemented</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-4">
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-emerald-600 font-bold text-lg">‚úì</span>
                <div>
                  <p class="text-sm text-gray-700"><strong>Separate Agree Buttons:</strong> Added individual "Agree"
                    buttons for each AI prediction source</p>
                  <ul class="list-disc list-inside mt-2 space-y-1 text-xs text-gray-600 ml-4">
                    <li>Dedicated "Agree" button for AI Model predictions</li>
                    <li>Separate "Agree" button for iNaturalist suggestions</li>
                    <li>Clear visual distinction between the two sources</li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- User Feedback Iteration 2 -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 to-orange-100 rounded-lg p-8 mb-8 relative">
          <!-- Interface Type Badge -->
          <div
            class="absolute top-4 right-4 bg-orange-700 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold shadow-lg">
            Expert-Facing Interface
          </div>
          <div class="flex items-start space-x-4 mb-6">
            <div
              class="bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
              2
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-orange-900 mb-2">
                Redundant Dialogue Box
              </h3>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-l-4 border-orange-600">
                <p class="text-gray-700 italic mb-2">
                  "If the expert were to agree with one of the suggestions, he would already have clicked their
                  respective agree button. If he clicks on disagree, he would be disagreeing with both to input his own
                  species identity. Therefore, a pop up for who the expert disagrees with is not useful."
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-orange-700 font-medium">
                  - User Testing Participant
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Image Comparison Slider 2 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 mb-8">
          <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-6">
            <!-- Main Page Image -->
            <div class="text-center">
              <div class="mb-4 relative">
                <img src="assets/redundant_dialogue_page.jpeg"
                  alt="Main verification page showing identical suggestions"
                  class="w-full h-64 object-cover rounded-lg shadow-md" />
                <div class="absolute top-2 left-2 bg-blue-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold text-sm">
                  Main Page
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Popup Image -->
            <div class="text-center">
              <div class="mb-4 relative">
                <img src="assets/redundant_dialogue.jpeg" alt="Redundant popup asking which suggestion to disagree with"
                  class="w-full h-64 object-contain rounded-lg shadow-md bg-gray-50" />
                <div class="absolute top-2 left-2 bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold text-sm">
                  Redundant Popup
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Analysis Summary -->
          <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-100 to-yellow-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-orange-900 mb-2">Design Logic Issue</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="space-y-3 text-sm text-gray-700">
              <div class="bg-red-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                <p class="text-red-800 font-medium text-sm mb-2">Unnecessary Question</p>
                <p class="text-xs">
                  "Who do you disagree with?" when you agree with one, the other is disagreed
                </p>
              </div>
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-green-600 font-bold">‚úì</span>
                <p><strong>If expert agrees:</strong> They would click the appropriate "Agree" button for either Model
                  or iNaturalist suggestion</p>
              </div>
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-red-600 font-bold">‚úó</span>
                <p><strong>If expert disagrees:</strong> They disagree with <em>both</em> suggestions since they're
                  identical, making the popup question meaningless</p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-100 to-green-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">üí° Solution Implemented</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-4">
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-emerald-600 font-bold text-lg">‚úì</span>
                <div>
                  <p class="text-sm text-gray-700"><strong>User Interface Removal:</strong> Updated flow of user
                    interface</p>
                  <ul class="list-disc list-inside mt-2 space-y-1 text-xs text-gray-600 ml-4">
                    <li>Remove redundant popup and streamline the disagreement workflow when suggestions are identical
                    </li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- User Feedback Iteration 3 -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-50 to-purple-100 rounded-lg p-8 mb-8 relative">
          <!-- Interface Type Badge -->
          <div
            class="absolute top-4 right-4 bg-purple-700 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold shadow-lg">
            Expert-Facing Interface
          </div>
          <div class="flex items-start space-x-4 mb-6">
            <div
              class="bg-purple-600 text-white rounded-full w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
              3
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-purple-900 mb-2">
                Cluttered Button Layout
              </h3>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-l-4 border-purple-600">
                <p class="text-gray-700 italic mb-2">
                  "I feel like the buttons are too cluttered, making it a bit
                  messy and confusing, is there another alternative?"
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-purple-700 font-medium">
                  - User Testing Participant
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Image Comparison Slider 3 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 mb-8">
          <h4 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4 text-center">
            Before vs After: Reorganized Interface Layout
          </h4>
          <div class="relative w-full max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div class="image-comparison-slider" id="slider3">
              <div class="image-comparison-container">
                <!-- Before/After Labels -->
                <div
                  class="before-label absolute top-4 left-4 bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  BEFORE
                </div>
                <div
                  class="after-label absolute top-4 right-4 bg-emerald-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  AFTER
                </div>

                <div class="image-comparison-before">
                  <img src="assets/comparison-2-after.jpeg" alt="After: Clean, organized layout"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-after">
                  <img src="assets/comparison-2-before.jpeg" alt="Before: Cluttered button arrangement"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-slider-handle" data-slider="slider3">
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-line"></div>
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-button">
                    <svg width="56" height="40" viewBox="0 0 56 40" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M16 12L8 20L16 28" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                      <path d="M40 28L48 20L40 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="mt-6 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
            <div class="text-center bg-red-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üóÇÔ∏è</div>
              <p class="text-red-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Cluttered button arrangement
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-red-600 mt-1">
                Buttons scattered around images, creating visual chaos
              </p>
            </div>
            <div class="text-center bg-emerald-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üì±</div>
              <p class="text-emerald-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Clean, organized layout
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-emerald-600 mt-1">
                Images on top, text and buttons grouped below
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Solution Box for Item 3 -->
          <div class="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-100 to-green-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">üí° Solution Implemented</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-4">
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-emerald-600 font-bold text-lg">‚úì</span>
                <div>
                  <p class="text-sm text-gray-700"><strong>Interface Reorganization:</strong> Streamlined layout with
                    improved content grouping and spacing</p>
                  <ul class="list-disc list-inside mt-2 space-y-1 text-xs text-gray-600 ml-4">
                    <li>Grouped predicted text together for better readability</li>
                    <li>Removed unnecessary redundant text elements</li>
                    <li>Added consistent padding throughout the UI</li>
                    <li>Reorganized buttons for cleaner visual hierarchy</li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- User Feedback Iteration 4 - Public Interface -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-teal-50 to-teal-100 rounded-lg p-8 mb-8 relative">
          <!-- Interface Type Badge -->
          <div
            class="absolute top-4 right-4 bg-teal-700 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold shadow-lg">
            Public-Facing Interface
          </div>
          <div class="flex items-start space-x-4 mb-6">
            <div
              class="bg-teal-600 text-white rounded-full w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
              4
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-teal-900 mb-2">
                Unnecessary AI Alternative Suggestions
              </h3>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-l-4 border-teal-600">
                <p class="text-gray-700 italic mb-2">
                  "The public users are not experts and will likely click on the suggestion with the highest confidence.
                  Showing multiple alternatives creates unnecessary complexity and confusion for non-expert users."
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-teal-700 font-medium">
                  - User Testing Participant
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Image Comparison Slider 4 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 mb-8">
          <div class="relative w-full max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <div class="image-comparison-slider" id="slider4">
              <div class="image-comparison-container">
                <!-- Before/After Labels -->
                <div
                  class="before-label absolute top-4 left-4 bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  BEFORE
                </div>
                <div
                  class="after-label absolute top-4 right-4 bg-emerald-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold z-10">
                  AFTER
                </div>

                <div class="image-comparison-before">
                  <img src="assets/public-comparison-after.jpeg" alt="After: Simplified public interface"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-after">
                  <img src="assets/public-comparison-before.jpeg"
                    alt="Before: Complex interface with multiple alternatives"
                    class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg" />
                </div>
                <div class="image-comparison-slider-handle" data-slider="slider4">
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-line"></div>
                  <div class="image-comparison-slider-button">
                    <svg width="56" height="40" viewBox="0 0 56 40" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M16 12L8 20L16 28" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                      <path d="M40 28L48 20L40 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round" />
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="mt-6 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
            <div class="text-center bg-red-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üîÑ</div>
              <p class="text-red-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Multiple AI alternatives shown
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-red-600 mt-1">
                Overwhelming for public users with various confidence levels displayed
              </p>
            </div>
            <div class="text-center bg-emerald-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <div class="text-4xl mb-2">üéØ</div>
              <p class="text-emerald-800 font-medium text-sm">
                Single highest confidence suggestion
              </p>
              <p class="text-xs text-emerald-600 mt-1">
                Simplified for public users with clear primary recommendation
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Solution Box for Item 4 -->
          <div class="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-100 to-green-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">üí° Solution Implemented</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-4">
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-emerald-600 font-bold text-lg">‚úì</span>
                <div>
                  <p class="text-sm text-gray-700"><strong>Interface Simplification:</strong> Streamlined public
                    interface to show only the most confident AI suggestion</p>
                  <ul class="list-disc list-inside mt-2 space-y-1 text-xs text-gray-600 ml-4">
                    <li>Removed multiple alternative suggestions for public users</li>
                    <li>Display only the highest confidence AI prediction</li>
                    <li>Reduced cognitive load for non-expert users</li>
                    <li>Focused design on clear, actionable primary recommendation</li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- User Feedback Iteration 5 - Public Interface Camera -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-50 to-indigo-100 rounded-lg p-8 mb-8 relative">
          <!-- Interface Type Badge -->
          <div
            class="absolute top-4 right-4 bg-indigo-700 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold shadow-lg">
            Public-Facing Interface
          </div>
          <div class="flex items-start space-x-4 mb-6">
            <div
              class="bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-full w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg flex-shrink-0">
              5
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-indigo-900 mb-2">
                Lack of Built-in Camera
              </h3>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-sm border-l-4 border-indigo-600">
                <p class="text-gray-700 italic mb-2">
                  "The issue with the design of this page was that users will have to take a photo of the animal with
                  their camera and upload the file onto the website to identify. This two step process is cumbersome and
                  has alot of friction, interrupting the flow of the process. Hence, allowing the option to access the
                  camera and take pictures directly will reduce user friction."
                </p>
                <p class="text-sm text-indigo-700 font-medium">
                  - User Testing Participant
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Single Image Display for Discovery Tool -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6 mb-8">
          <div class="relative w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto">
            <img src="assets/public-discovery-tool.jpeg"
              alt="Public discovery tool showing current upload-only workflow"
              class="w-full h-96 object-cover rounded-lg shadow-md" />
            <div class="absolute top-4 left-4 bg-indigo-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-md font-semibold">
              Current Design
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Process Flow Analysis -->
          <div class="mt-6 bg-red-50 rounded-lg p-6">
            <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-red-800 mb-4 text-center">Current Two-Step Process Issues</h5>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-red-400">
                <h6 class="font-medium text-red-800 mb-2">Step 1: External Photo Capture</h6>
                <p class="text-sm text-red-700">
                  Users must use their device's camera app to take photos separately from the identification process
                </p>
              </div>
              <div class="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-red-400">
                <h6 class="font-medium text-red-800 mb-2">Step 2: File Upload Process</h6>
                <p class="text-sm text-red-700">
                  Navigate back to the website, find the captured image, and upload through file browser
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>

            <div class="mt-4 bg-yellow-100 p-4 rounded-lg">
              <h6 class="font-medium text-yellow-800 mb-2 flex items-center">
                <span class="text-xl mr-2">‚ö†Ô∏è</span>
                User Friction Points
              </h6>
              <ul class="list-disc list-inside space-y-1 text-sm text-yellow-700">
                <li>Context switching between camera app and website</li>
                <li>Potential loss of identification momentum</li>
                <li>Additional navigation steps in file system</li>
                <li>Higher probability of user abandonment</li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Solution Box for Item 5 -->
          <div class="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-100 to-green-100 rounded-lg p-6">
            <div class="text-center mb-4">
              <h5 class="text-lg font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">üí° Solution Implemented</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-4">
              <div class="flex items-start space-x-3">
                <span class="text-emerald-600 font-bold text-lg">‚úì</span>
                <div>
                  <p class="text-sm text-gray-700"><strong>Integrated Camera Access:</strong> Direct camera integration
                    within the web application</p>
                  <ul class="list-disc list-inside mt-2 space-y-1 text-xs text-gray-600 ml-4">
                    <li>Added direct camera access button alongside file upload option</li>
                    <li>Eliminated context switching between apps</li>
                    <li>Streamlined one-step photo capture and identification process</li>
                    <li>Reduced user friction and improved workflow continuity</li>
                    <li>Maintained file upload option for users with existing photos</li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Expert Interview Section -->
      <div class="mb-16">
        <div class="bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 to-teal-50 rounded-lg p-8">
          <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div class="text-4xl mb-4">üéì</div>
            <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-emerald-900 mb-2">
              Tutor Feedback Session
            </h3>
            <p class="text-lg text-gray-700">
              In-depth insights and feedbacks from our research tutor
            </p>
          </div>

          <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6">
            <div class="aspect-video bg-gray-100 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4">
              <iframe width="100%" height="100%"
                src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/rLIzdVb1hFA?si=NgXWLL09RMA2qD0e"
                title="Tutor Feedback Session - Expert Interview" frameborder="0"
                allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"
                referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen class="rounded-lg"></iframe>
            </div>


            <!-- Key Insights Section -->
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-1 gap-6">
              <div class="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-6">
                <h5 class="font-semibold text-emerald-700 mb-4 flex items-center">
                  <span class="text-xl mr-2">üí°</span>
                  Feedback & Insights Mentioned
                </h5>
                <div class="space-y-4">
                  <div class="border-l-4 border-orange-300 pl-4 bg-orange-50 p-3 rounded-r-lg">
                    <h6 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Disagree Functionality Concerns</h6>
                    <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                      Questioned the purpose of the "disagree" button when neither of the AI's suggestions are correct.
                      This could create unnecessary cognitive load on experts who frequently need to disagree with
                      incorrect identifications.
                    </p>
                  </div>

                  <div class="border-l-4 border-blue-300 pl-4 bg-blue-50 p-3 rounded-r-lg">
                    <h6 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Public Input Quality Issues</h6>
                    <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                      Concerns were raised about the quality of images uploaded by the public, including blurry or
                      unclear pictures, and people uploading images for non-scientific purposes.
                    </p>
                  </div>

                  <div class="border-l-4 border-red-300 pl-4 bg-red-50 p-3 rounded-r-lg">
                    <h6 class="font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Low-Confidence Image Filtering</h6>
                    <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                      Feedback highlighted that automatically filtering out images with low AI confidence might
                      unintentionally discard images of new or rarely seen species, potentially missing important
                      scientific discoveries.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    </div>
  </section>

  <!-- Section 5: Final Product -->
  <section id="final-product" class="py-20 bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-50 to-gray-100">
    <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6">
      <div class="text-center mb-16">
        <h2 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-playfair font-bold text-emerald-900 mb-4">
          Final Product
        </h2>
        <div class="w-24 h-1 bg-emerald-600 mx-auto"></div>
        <p class="text-lg text-gray-700 mt-6 max-w-2xl mx-auto">
          Try out our interactive prototype below!
        </p>
      </div>

      <!-- Interactive Figma Prototype Showcase -->
      <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8 mb-12">

        <div class="figma-embed-container">
          <iframe style="border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);" width="100%" height="700"
            src="https://embed.figma.com/proto/KHIpH3dLtt6Xp3QiQIfrlN/Prototype?node-id=6-3&scaling=contain&content-scaling=fixed&page-id=0%3A1&starting-point-node-id=6%3A3&embed-host=share"
            allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
        <div class="mt-4 text-center">
          <a href="https://embed.figma.com/design/KHIpH3dLtt6Xp3QiQIfrlN/Prototype?node-id=0-1&embed-host=share"
            target="_blank"
            class="inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 bg-emerald-600 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-emerald-700 transition-colors text-sm font-medium">
            <img src="assets/figma-icon.svg" alt="Figma" class="w-4 h-4 mr-2" />
            Open in Figma
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>

  </section>

  <!-- Footer -->
  <footer class="bg-emerald-900 text-white py-12">
    <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 text-center">
      <div class="text-3xl font-playfair font-bold mb-4">Botaniq</div>
      <p class="text-emerald-200 mb-6">
        Team 08 | University of Glasgow | Glasgow Botanic Garden Project
      </p>
      <div class="border-t border-emerald-700 pt-6">
        <p class="text-emerald-300 text-sm">
          ¬© 2025 Team 08, University of Glasgow. Created in partnership with
          Glasgow Botanic Garden.
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </footer>

  <!-- Custom JavaScript -->
  <script src="script.js"></script>

  <!-- Image Comparison Slider Script -->
  <script>
    // Initialize image comparison sliders
    window.addEventListener("load", function () {
      const sliders = document.querySelectorAll(".image-comparison-slider");

      sliders.forEach((slider) => {
        const container = slider.querySelector(".image-comparison-container");
        const afterImage = slider.querySelector(".image-comparison-after");
        const handle = slider.querySelector(
          ".image-comparison-slider-handle"
        );
        const beforeLabel = slider.querySelector(".before-label");
        const afterLabel = slider.querySelector(".after-label");

        if (!container || !afterImage || !handle) return;

        let isDragging = false;

        function updateSlider(clientX) {
          const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();
          const x = Math.max(0, Math.min(clientX - rect.left, rect.width));
          const percentage = (x / rect.width) * 100;

          afterImage.style.clipPath = `inset(0 ${100 - percentage}% 0 0)`;
          handle.style.left = `${percentage}%`;

          // Hide/show labels based on slider position
          if (beforeLabel) {
            beforeLabel.style.opacity = percentage < 20 ? "0" : "1";
          }
          if (afterLabel) {
            afterLabel.style.opacity = percentage > 80 ? "0" : "1";
          }
        }

        // Mouse events
        handle.addEventListener("mousedown", function (e) {
          isDragging = true;
          document.body.style.cursor = "ew-resize";
          updateSlider(e.clientX);
          e.preventDefault();
        });

        document.addEventListener("mousemove", function (e) {
          if (!isDragging) return;
          updateSlider(e.clientX);
          e.preventDefault();
        });

        document.addEventListener("mouseup", function (e) {
          if (!isDragging) return;
          isDragging = false;
          document.body.style.cursor = "";
        });

        // Click to position
        container.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
          if (e.target === handle || handle.contains(e.target)) return;
          updateSlider(e.clientX);
        });

        // Touch events for mobile
        handle.addEventListener(
          "touchstart",
          function (e) {
            isDragging = true;
            const touch = e.touches[0];
            updateSlider(touch.clientX);
            e.preventDefault();
          },
          { passive: false }
        );

        document.addEventListener(
          "touchmove",
          function (e) {
            if (!isDragging) return;
            const touch = e.touches[0];
            updateSlider(touch.clientX);
            e.preventDefault();
          },
          { passive: false }
        );

        document.addEventListener("touchend", function (e) {
          if (!isDragging) return;
          isDragging = false;
        });

        // Initialize slider at 50% position
        afterImage.style.clipPath = "inset(0 50% 0 0)";
        handle.style.left = "50%";
      });
    });
  </script>

  <!-- Flowbite JavaScript -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/flowbite@3.1.2/dist/flowbite.min.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

================
File: reflections.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  <meta name="description"
    content="Botaniq Project Timeline - Team 08 University of Glasgow project journey documenting key milestones and progress" />
  <title>Project Timeline - Botaniq | Team 08 UofG</title>

  <!-- Tailwind CSS -->
  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>

  <!-- Google Fonts -->
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com" />
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
  <link
    href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap"
    rel="stylesheet" />

  <!-- GSAP for animations -->
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.12.2/gsap.min.js"></script>
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/gsap/3.12.2/ScrollTrigger.min.js"></script>

  <!-- Custom CSS -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css" />

  <style>
    /* Timeline specific styles */
    .timeline-container {
      position: relative;
    }

    .timeline-line {
      position: absolute;
      left: 50%;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      width: 4px;
      background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #10b981, #059669);
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      border-radius: 2px;
    }

    .timeline-item {
      position: relative;
      margin-bottom: 3rem;
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(30px);
      transition: all 0.6s ease;
    }

    .timeline-item.animate {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }

    .timeline-item:nth-child(odd) {
      padding-right: 50%;
      padding-left: 0;
    }

    .timeline-item:nth-child(even) {
      padding-left: 50%;
      padding-right: 0;
      text-align: left;
    }

    .timeline-item:nth-child(odd) .timeline-content {
      margin-right: 2rem;
      text-align: right;
    }

    .timeline-item:nth-child(even) .timeline-content {
      margin-left: 2rem;
      text-align: left;
    }

    .timeline-dot {
      position: absolute;
      left: 50%;
      top: 1.5rem;
      width: 20px;
      height: 20px;
      background: #10b981;
      border: 4px solid white;
      border-radius: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #10b981;
      z-index: 10;
    }

    .timeline-dot.milestone {
      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;
      background: #dc2626;
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #dc2626;
    }

    .timeline-dot.future {
      background: #9ca3af;
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #9ca3af;
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      .timeline-line {
        left: 2rem;
      }

      .timeline-item {
        padding-left: 4rem !important;
        padding-right: 0 !important;
        text-align: left !important;
      }

      .timeline-item .timeline-content {
        margin-left: 0 !important;
        margin-right: 0 !important;
        text-align: left !important;
      }

      .timeline-dot {
        left: 2rem;
      }
    }

    .reflection-tab {
      background: #f3f4f6;
      color: #6b7280;
      border: 2px solid transparent;
    }

    .reflection-tab.active {
      background: #10b981;
      color: white;
      border-color: #059669;
    }

    .reflection-tab:hover {
      background: #e5e7eb;
      color: #374151;
    }

    .reflection-tab.active:hover {
      background: #059669;
      color: white;
    }

    .reflection-content {
      display: none;
    }

    .reflection-content.active {
      display: block;
      animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }

    @keyframes fadeIn {
      from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
      }

      to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
      }
    }

    .reflection-card {
      border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
      backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    }

    .reflection-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-5px);
    }

    .expanded-content {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(-10px);
      transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .read-more-btn {
      cursor: pointer;
      outline: none;
      border: none;
      background: none;
      padding: 0;
    }

    .read-more-btn:focus {
      outline: 2px solid #3b82f6;
      outline-offset: 2px;
      border-radius: 4px;
    }
  </style>
</head>
